description:
He`s a Velunnian. While most aliens do their best to blend in, he`s happy-go-lucky persona has bubbled over into his appearance - you`ll always be able to spot his wavy curls and bright red Hawaiian shirt. He is a first class diplomat, and every once in a while, you can tell that there`s something hidden behind his cheerful smile...
Source: shingu.rightstuf.com
name: Jirutoushu
